DOC.brief_summary: This study is a Post-Marketing Surveillance study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of bimatoprost/timolol (Ganfort®) Ophthalmic Solution to treat open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension in Korea.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Bimatoprost/Timolol (Ganfort®) Ophthalmic Solution in Korea
DOC.criteria: Patients treated with Ganfort® for openangle glaucoma or ocular hypertension in clinical practice.
